approveWork(uint256,uint256).details: Bounty owner call it to approve a work submitted for this work

params._bountyId: uint256 Id of the bounty the work is linked to
params._workId: uint256 Id of the work that will be approved

bountyCountWorks(uint256).details: Returns the number of work that has been submitted for this bounty

constructor.details: Constructor that set the owner of the contract

createBounty(uint256,string,string).details: Create a new bounty as a creator the caller The user must provide at least the amount that he is willing to pay for this bounty

params.amount: uint256 Amount to be paid when the bounty is done
params.title: string Title of the bounty to create

getBountyInfos(uint256).details: Get all the infos abount a bounty

getLastBountyId().details: Returns the last bounty id that was created

getWorkProposedIds(uint256).details: Returns an array of uint256 that the ids of the work that have been submitted for this bounty

isBountyOpened(uint256).details: Returns true if the bounty has not been filled yet

rejectWork(uint256,uint256).details: Bounty owner call it to reject a work submitted for this work

params._bountyId: uint256 Id of the bounty the work is linked to
params._workId: uint256 Id of the work that will be rejected

submitWork(string,uint256).details: Submit the work that has been done for approval

params.id: uint256 Id of the bounty the work has been done for

withdrawPending().details: Allow to withdraw a pending balance of a user

submitWork(string,uint256).notice: Use IFPS to submit the work
